text: Commune is a word that can have different meanings: * In many languages, especially those coming from Latin, it can stand for an administrative division, see municipality. * In the Mass of many Christian groups, it stands for a number of texts that are common among different forms of Mass, see common (liturgy) * A larger number of people who have similar ideas or values, sometimes form what is called an intentional community. * A medieval commune
title: Commune
